Legal_Issue: Were the Applicants denied procedural fairness by not being notified that further evidence had been requested?
Evidence_Assessment: The Officer sent a request for information to the wrong party, preventing the Applicant from responding.
Decision_Outcome: The original decision was set aside.
Legal_Rule: Procedural fairness requires providing those affected by a decision with an opportunity to present their views and evidence fully.
Procedural_Issue: Failure to notify the Applicant of a request for additional information regarding their humanitarian and compassionate grounds application.
Judicial_Review_Outcome: The application for judicial review is allowed.
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: The Applicants were denied procedural fairness due to lack of notification.
Key_Evidence_Considered: Request for information sent to wrong party
Applicant_Challenge: Lack of notification about additional evidence request
Court_Result: Application for judicial review allowed; matter remanded for reconsideration.
Outcome: Original decision set aside; remanded for re-determination
Remedy_Sought: Re-determination of the humanitarian and compassionate grounds application
Applicable_Process: Humanitarian and Compassionate grounds application process
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Humanitarian and Compassionate grounds application under reconsideration
